org.hps.recon.tracking

Class HpsHelicalTrackFit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.fit.helicaltrack.HelicalTrackFit
      • org.hps.recon.tracking.HpsHelicalTrackFit

  • public class HpsHelicalTrackFit
extends HelicalTrackFit
    Extension of HelicalTrackFit to include HPS-specific information and utilities.
